casebody.data:
STATE OF CONNECTICUT v. PAUL MARCHITTO (AC 16558)

O’Connell, C. X, and Spear and Hennessy, Js.

Argued September 15 officially released October 7, 1997 Per Curiam.

This case is controlled by State v. Elliott, 177 Conn. 1, 411 A.2d 3 (1979), and State v. Vas, 44 Conn. App. 70, 687 A.2d 1295, cert. denied, 240 Conn. 910, 689 A.2d 474 (1997).

The judgment is affirmed.
